verses.text_plain: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.
verses.verse_html: 1But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.

verses.text_plain: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.
verses.verse_html: 2For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.

verses.text_plain: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.
verses.verse_html: 3For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.

verses.text_plain: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.
verses.verse_html: 4But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.

verses.text_plain: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.
verses.verse_html: 5Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.

verses.text_plain: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.
verses.verse_html: 6Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.

verses.text_plain: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.
verses.verse_html: 7For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.

verses.text_plain: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.
verses.verse_html: 8But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.

verses.text_plain: For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,
verses.verse_html: 9For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,

verses.text_plain: Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.
verses.verse_html: 10Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.

verses.text_plain: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.
verses.verse_html: 11Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.

verses.text_plain: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;
verses.verse_html: 12And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;

verses.text_plain: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work’s sake. And be at peace among yourselves.
verses.verse_html: 13And to esteem them very highly in love for their work’s sake. And be at peace among yourselves.

verses.text_plain: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.
verses.verse_html: 14Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.

verses.text_plain: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.
verses.verse_html: 15See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.

verses.text_plain: Rejoice evermore.
verses.verse_html: 16Rejoice evermore.

verses.text_plain: Pray without ceasing.
verses.verse_html: 17Pray without ceasing.

verses.text_plain: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.
verses.verse_html: 18In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.

verses.text_plain: Quench not the Spirit.
verses.verse_html: 19Quench not the Spirit.

verses.text_plain: Despise not prophesyings.
verses.verse_html: 20Despise not prophesyings.

verses.text_plain: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.
verses.verse_html: 21Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.

verses.text_plain: Abstain from all appearance of evil.
verses.verse_html: 22Abstain from all appearance of evil.

verses.text_plain: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.verse_html: 23And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.text_plain: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.
verses.verse_html: 24Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.

verses.text_plain: Brethren, pray for us.
verses.verse_html: 25Brethren, pray for us.

verses.text_plain: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.
verses.verse_html: 26Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.

verses.text_plain: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.
verses.verse_html: 27I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.

verses.text_plain: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen. The first epistle unto the Thessalonians was written from Athens.
verses.verse_html: 28The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen. The first epistle unto the Thessalonians was written from Athens.
